output:
A kind of general and panoramic view of the whole of human history up to now.
And the Almighty said to me, Martin Luther King, which age would you like to live in?
I would take my mental flight by Egypt.
And I would watch God's children in their magnificent presence.
From the dark dungeons of Egypt through a rubber across the Red Sea, through the wilderness on toward the promised land.
And in spite of its magnificence, I wouldn't stop there.
I would move on by Greece and take my mind to Mount Olympus.
And I would see Plato, Aristotle, Socrates, Euripides, and Aristophanes assembled.
